name: Two Minute Detective
description: This is a prototype of a game I have had in my head for a while. I made three levels just to see if anyone thought it was fun or not. I would want to add more levels and more interesting deduction-heavy questions with better input types than just multiple-choice buttons. At the moment I just utilized some low poly assets and multiple choice. I am doing this for feedback so please let me know if you would play something like this and what changes you would make.
